Package io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BridgeModbus  
    BridgeModbusSerial  
    BridgeModbusTcp  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractOpenemsModbusComponent  
    ElementToChannelConverter
    Provides Functions to convert from Element to Channel and back.
    ElementToChannelConverterChain  
    ElementToChannelOffsetConverter
    Converts between Element and Channel by applying an offset (channel = element + offset)
    ElementToChannelScaleFactorConverter
    Converts between Element and Channel by applying a scale factor of 2 (channel = element * 10^scaleFactor) Example: if the Register is in unit [0.1 V] this converter converts to unit [1 mV]
    ModbusProtocol  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractOpenemsModbusComponent.BitConverter  
    Parity  
    Stopbit
